name: 2018/10/05 Dinner
description: This high-protein, low-sugar dinner is perfect for those looking to enjoy a healthified meal. Filled with nutritious ingredients like belly, chicken, red onion, coconut, kimchi, cucumber, and Adlai Rice (Job's Tears), this recipe is designed to delight the health-conscious eater seeking healthy recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice (Job's Tears) under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, about 20 minutes. Then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the red onion, dice the cucumber, and chop the belly and chicken into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the coconut oil over medium heat and saut√© the chopped belly and chicken until they're browned and cooked through, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced red onion to the pan and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the kimchi and diced cucumber, and cook for another 5 minutes until everything is heated through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked ingredients with the Adlai Rice in a large bowl. Mix well until everything is evenly distributed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
